name: FIVE NIGHTS AT 2
description:
(Warning! - May lag on some devices.)

A sequel to "Five Nights at" - A semi - ironic fnaf - themed space shooter based off an inside joke between me and my friends.

(Play the original here: https://flyingpiggles10.itch.io/five-nights-at-uh-what )

Stop glitchtrap from selling PC speed up malware!

Controls - 

WASD To move

Space to shoot

Mouse to aim

Z to continue text 

Avoid the bullets!

Songs used:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Eo56HTijkQ0 (By https://soundcloud.com/meganeko)

Mega Man Unlimited OST  - Deathtrap Mirage 

Freddy Fazbear's Pizzeria Simulator OST  - 240 Bits Per Mile

Sound Effects are from FNaF 3/4 and Undertale.
